title: Comment from The Rev. Michael Poteet

analysis.key_quote: I urge the Office of Personnel Management to reject this proposed rule and safeguard the stability and professionalism of the civil service.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed changes, emphasizing the importance of a merit-based system and the risks of politicization in the civil service. It highlights concerns about the integrity and stability of federal employment, which aligns with opposition to the rule.
